docs.snippet: Many basketball players today are a foot taller than players were in the 1800s; the rim is no longer out of reach. Should it be raised?...
docs.abstract: Many basketball players today are a foot taller than players were in the 1800s; the rim is no longer out of reach. Should it be raised?
